thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Long weekend break
thread.title_full: Long weekend break - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Margaret B
title: Long weekend break
text: Great place to stay as you're central for a lot of the tourist attractions. Waterloo station just 5 minutes walk, leading to tube to get you most anywhere in the city. Right in front of the hotel is the London eye, so you're right on the Embankment. It was my daughters first time In London, so we did most of the attractions, she was really impressed with the views from the London eye, but most importantly the shopping.
